name: Sailor's Adventure
description:
In this game you play as a Sailor,

Who wants to cover the ocean using his boat.

But covering Oceans isn't that easy be aware of up comming cargo ships, sharks, and the most dangerous ones Octopus.

Show your true skill in the ocean

Bug Fixes:

Score count bug has been fixed (from now onwards the game should add the score by 1 inetead of 10)
